title: Earthian, Volume 4
description: Blu presents Earthian's "Secret Garden" collection! Filled with heartbreaking tales of the forbidden relationship between Lord Michael and Raphael, this volume also includes a never-before-seen bonus story specifically created for this special deluxe edition. And as a fitting epilogue to the unforgettable manga series, catch a glimpse of the future of all your favorite Earthian characters! Includes special notes by Kouga-sensei!
author: Yun Kouga
